Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis

Package Client.View

package Client.View
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the User Interface.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Client
    This package contains the classes that are used in the client side of the application.
    Client.Connection
    This package contains the classes that manage the connection to the server.
    Client.Controller
    This package contains the controller class for the client side of the application.
  • Class
    Description
    CLI
    This class is responsible for the user interface logic of the command line interface of the client side of the application.
    CLIState
    This interface is used to represent the state of the CLI.
    GameState
    This class represents the state of the CLI when the game is ongoing
    GUI
    This class is responsible for the graphical user interface logic of the client side of the application.
    JoinState
    This state is used to ask the user to join a server
    LeaderboardState
    CLI state for the leaderboard
    NetworkState
    This state is used to ask the user to choose the network mode
    OnBoardCard
    This class is responsible for the visualization of the card on the screen.
    OtherPlayerTab
    This class is responsible for the visualization of the other player's manuscript.
    SecretCardChoiceState
    This class represents the state of the game where the player has to choose the secret card.
    SetColorState
    This class represents the state of the game where the player has to set his color and ready status.
    SetNameState
    This class represents the lobby state of the game.
    StartingCardChoiceState
    This class represents the state of the game where the player has to choose the starting card.
    UI
    This interface is responsible for the user interface logic of the client side of the application.
